CustomField.formula:
If(System_Numerical_Indicator__c = TRUE,VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(System_New_Value_Input__c,",","")),NULL)
/* Include SUBSTITUTE to remove commas as provided in Value Input field by DnB */
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula to return Numerical value of New Value field for use in Report Charts.
CustomField.label: New Value (Numerical)
